direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve product positions but for different types (flexible vs. locked).
Both methods handle similar control flows and parameter handling for product-related operations.
Both methods modify the state related to flexible products, though in different ways (retrieval vs. subscription).
Both methods access and manipulate flexible product positions, though for different purposes (retrieval vs. redemption).
Both methods handle similar exceptions related to flexible product operations.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the request handler is required before any product-related operations.
Fetching the flexible product list can be a prerequisite to retrieving specific product positions.
Both methods verify product positions and handle similar exceptions.
